verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man דַּבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> to the children עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> of thy people וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> upon אֶ֕רֶץ <WH776> upon a land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If אָבִ֥יא <WH935> unto them When I bring עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> the sword וְלָקְח֨וּ <WH3947> take עַם־ <WH5971> if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> of the land אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָד֙ <WH259> a מִקְצֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7097> of their coasts וְנָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> and set אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> לָהֶ֖ם לְצֹפֶֽה׃ <WH6822> him for their watchman

וְרָאָ֥ה <WH7200> If when he seeth אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> come עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the land וְתָקַ֥ע <WH8628> he blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> the trumpet וְהִזְהִ֥יר <WH2094> and warn אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וְשָׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> Then whosoever הַשֹּׁמֵ֜עַ <WH8085> heareth אֶת־ <WH853> ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> of the trumpet וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> and taketh not warning וַתָּ֥בוֹא <WH935> come חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> if the sword וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <WH3947> and take him away דָּמ֥וֹ <WH1818> his blood בְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> shall be upon his own head יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

אֵת֩ <WH853> ק֨וֹל <WH6963> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <WH7782> of the trumpet שָׁמַע֙ <WH8085> He heard וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> and took not warning דָּמ֖וֹ <WH1818> his blood בּ֣וֹ יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he נִזְהָ֖ר <WH2094> shall be upon him But he that taketh warning נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <WH5315> his soul מִלֵּֽט׃ <WH4422> shall deliver

וְ֠הַצֹּפֶה <WH6822> But if the watchman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if יִרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> see אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֜רֶב <WH2719> the sword בָּאָ֗ה <WH935> come וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and does not תָקַ֤ע <WH8628> and blow בַּשּׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> not the trumpet וְהָעָ֣ם <WH5971> and the people לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> be not warned וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> come חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> if the sword וַתִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> and take מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> [any] person ה֚וּא <WH1931> he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> in his iniquity נִלְקָ֔ח <WH3947> from among them he is taken away וְדָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> but his blood מִיַּֽד־ <WH3027> hand הַצֹּפֶ֥ה <WH6822> at the watchman's אֶדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <WH1875> will I require ס

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> So thou O son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man צֹפֶ֥ה <WH6822> thee a watchman נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> I have set לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <WH8085> therefore thou shalt hear מִפִּי֙ <WH6310> at my mouth דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the word וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <WH2094> and warn אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

בְּאָמְרִ֣י <WH559> When I say לָרָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> unto the wicked רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> O wicked מ֣וֹת <WH4191> [man] thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <WH4191> die וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not דִבַּ֔רְתָּ <WH1696> if thou dost not speak לְהַזְהִ֥יר <WH2094> to warn רָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> from his way ה֤וּא <WH1931> he רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> that wicked בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> [man] shall die וְדָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> will I require

וְ֠אַתָּה <WH859> your part כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if הִזְהַ֨רְתָּ <WH2094> Nevertheless if thou warn רָשָׁ֤ע <WH7563> the wicked מִדַּרְכּוֹ֙ <WH1870> of his way לָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> to turn מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> at וְלֹא־ <WH3808> does not שָׁ֖ב <WH7725> from it if he do not turn מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> from his way ה֚וּא <WH1931> he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> he shall die וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> your part נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <WH5337> but thou hast delivered ס

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Therefore O thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> Thus אֲמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH559> Thus ye speak לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely פְשָׁעֵ֥ינוּ <WH6588> If our transgressions וְחַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <WH2403> and our sins עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and וּבָ֛ם אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we נְמַקִּ֖ים <WH4743> [be] upon us and we pine away וְאֵ֥יךְ <WH349> how נִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> in them how should we then live

אֱמֹ֨ר <WH559> Say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> unto חַי־ <WH2416> unto them [As] I live אָ֣נִי ׀ <WH589> I נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> no אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <WH2654> I have no pleasure בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> in the death הָרָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> of the wicked כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> no בְּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> turn רָשָׁ֛ע <WH7563> but that the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> from his way וְחָיָ֑ה <WH2421> and live שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> turn שׁ֜וּבוּ <WH7725> ye turn מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֧ם <WH1870> ways הָרָעִ֛ים <WH7451> ye from your evil וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why תָמ֖וּתוּ <WH4191> for why will ye die בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man אֱמֹ֤ר <WH559> say אֶל־ <WH413> and בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> unto the children עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> of thy people צִדְקַ֣ת <WH6666> The righteousness הַצַּדִּ֗יק <WH6662> of the righteous לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not תַצִּילֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH5337> shall not deliver בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> him in the day פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <WH6588> of his transgression וְרִשְׁעַ֤ת <WH7564> as for the wickedness הָֽרָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> of the wicked לֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יִכָּ֣שֶׁל <WH3782> he shall not fall בָּ֔הּ בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> thereby in the day שׁוּב֣וֹ <WH7725> that he turneth מֵֽרִשְׁע֑וֹ <WH7562> from his wickedness וְצַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> neither shall the righteous לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> be able לִֽחְי֥וֹת <WH2421> to live בָּ֖הּ בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> for his [righteousness] in the day חֲטֹאתֽוֹ׃ <WH2398> that he sinneth

בְּאָמְרִ֤י <WH559> When I shall say לַצַּדִּיק֙ <WH6662> to the righteous חָיֹ֣ה <WH2421> [that] he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <WH2421> live וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he בָטַ֥ח <WH982> if he trust עַל־ <WH5921> in צִדְקָת֖וֹ <WH6666> to his own righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> and commit עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> iniquity כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner [צִדְקָתֹו כ] (צִדְקֹתָיו֙ <WH6666> his righteousness ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <WH2142> shall not be remembered וּבְעַוְל֥וֹ <WH5766> but for his iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of his which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that he hath committed בּ֥וֹ יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> he shall die

וּבְאָמְרִ֥י <WH559> Again when I say לָֽרָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> unto the wicked מ֣וֹת <WH4191> Thou shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <WH4191> die וְשָׁב֙ <WH7725> if he turn מֵֽחַטָּאת֔וֹ <WH2403> from his sin וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> and right

חֲבֹ֨ל <WH2258> the pledge יָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> restore רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> [If] the wicked גְּזֵלָ֣ה <WH1500> that he had robbed יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> give again בְּחֻקּ֤וֹת <WH2708> in the statutes הַֽחַיִּים֙ <WH2416> of life הָלַ֔ךְ <WH1980> walk לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> without עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> without committing עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> iniquity חָי֥וֹ <WH2421> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> live לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> he shall not die

כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <WH2403> sin ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he חָטָ֔א <WH2398> that he hath committed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִזָּכַ֖רְנָה <WH2142> shall be mentioned ל֑וֹ מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֛ה <WH6666> and right עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> unto him he hath done חָי֥וֹ <WH2421> he shall surely יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> live

וְאָמְרוּ֙ <WH559> say בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Yet the children עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> of thy people לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <WH8505> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> of the Lord וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like דַּרְכָּ֥ם <WH1870> but as for them their way לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not יִתָּכֵֽן׃ <WH8505> is not equal

בְּשׁוּב־ <WH7725> turneth צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> When the righteous מִצִּדְקָת֖וֹ <WH6666> from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> and committeth עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> iniquity וּמֵ֖ת <WH4191> he shall even die בָּהֶֽם׃

וּבְשׁ֤וּב <WH7725> turn רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> But if the wicked מֵֽרִשְׁעָת֔וֹ <WH7564> from his wickedness וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> and right עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and ה֥וּא <WH1931> he יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> he shall live

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> Yet ye say לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <WH8505> is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> of the Lord אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> you every one כִּדְרָכָ֛יו <WH1870> after his ways אֶשְׁפּ֥וֹט <WH8199> I will judge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become בִּשְׁתֵּ֧י <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> year בָּעֲשִׂרִ֛י <WH6224> in the tenth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month לְגָלוּתֵ֑נוּ <WH1546> of our captivity בָּא־ <WH935> came אֵלַ֨י <WH413> about הַפָּלִ֧יט <WH6412> [that] one that had escaped מִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> out of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> unto me saying הֻכְּתָ֥ה <WH5221> is smitten הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> The city

וְיַד־ <WH3027> Now the hand יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> of the LORD הָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> had been אֵלַ֜י <WH413> upon בָּעֶ֗רֶב <WH6153> was upon me in the evening לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> afore בּ֣וֹא <WH935> came הַפָּלִ֔יט <WH6412> he that was escaped וַיִּפְתַּ֣ח <WH6605> and had opened אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֔י <WH6310> my mouth עַד־ <WH5704> the time בּ֥וֹא <WH935> until he came אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> to me in the morning וַיִּפָּ֣תַח <WH6605> was opened פִּ֔י <WH6310> and my mouth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> was no נֶאֱלַ֖מְתִּי <WH481> and I was no more dumb עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man יֹ֠שְׁבֵי <WH3427> they that inhabit הֶחֳרָב֨וֹת <WH2723> those wastes הָאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these עַל־ <WH5921> in אַדְמַ֤ת <WH127> of the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> speak לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אֶחָד֙ <WH259> was one הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> Abraham וַיִּירַ֖שׁ <WH3423> and he inherited אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> but we [are] many לָ֛נוּ נִתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> is given הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land לְמוֹרָשָֽׁה׃ <WH4181> us for inheritance ס

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֨ר <WH559> Wherefore say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD עַל־ <WH5921> with הַדָּ֧ם ׀ <WH1818> with the blood תֹּאכֵ֛לוּ <WH398> Ye eat וְעֵינֵכֶ֛ם <WH5869> your eyes תִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> and lift up אֶל־ <WH413> to גִּלּוּלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1544> toward your idols וְדָ֣ם <WH1818> blood תִּשְׁפֹּ֑כוּ <WH8210> and shed וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> then תִּירָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH3423> and shall ye possess

עֲמַדְתֶּ֤ם <WH5975> Ye stand עַֽל־ <WH5921> on חַרְבְּכֶם֙ <WH2719> upon your sword עֲשִׂיתֶ֣ן <WH6213> ye work תּוֹעֵבָ֔ה <WH8441> abomination וְאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour's טִמֵּאתֶ֑ם <WH2930> and ye defile וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> then תִּירָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH3423> and shall ye possess ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַ֨ר <WH559> Say אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> to כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> thou thus unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֮ <WH3069> GOD חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָנִי֒ <WH589> I אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֞א <WH3808> not אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who בֶּֽחֳרָבוֹת֙ <WH2723> surely they that [are] in the wastes בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> shall fall וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> and whoever עַל־ <WH5921> is in פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> and him that [is] in the open הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> field לַחַיָּ֥ה <WH2416> to the beasts נְתַתִּ֖יו <WH5414> will I give לְאָכְל֑וֹ <WH398> to be devoured וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who בַּמְּצָד֥וֹת <WH4686> castle וּבַמְּעָר֖וֹת <WH4631> and in the caves בַּדֶּ֥בֶר <WH1698> of the pestilence יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <WH4191> shall die

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> For I will lay אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the land שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH4923> most וְנִשְׁבַּ֖ת <WH7673> shall cease גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> and the pomp עֻזָּ֑הּ <WH5797> of her strength וְשָֽׁמְמ֛וּ <WH8074> shall be desolate הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> and the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> no עוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> that none shall pass through

וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> Then shall they know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּ֤י <WH5414> when I have laid אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> the land שְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH4923> most עַ֥ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all תּוֹעֲבֹתָ֖ם <WH8441> because of all their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> which they have committed ס

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Also thou son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children עַמְּךָ֗ <WH5971> of thy people הַנִּדְבָּרִ֤ים <WH1696> still are talking בְּךָ֙ אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> against הַקִּיר֔וֹת <WH7023> thee by the walls וּבְפִתְחֵ֖י <WH6607> and in the doors הַבָּתִּ֑ים <WH1004> of the houses וְדִבֶּר־ <WH1696> and speak חַ֣ד <WH2297> one אֶת־ <WH853> אַחַ֗ד <WH259> to another אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶת־ <WH854> for אָחִיו֙ <WH251> to his brother לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בֹּֽאוּ־ <WH935> Come נָ֣א <WH4994> now וְשִׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> I pray you and hear מָ֣ה <WH4100> what הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> what is the word הַיּוֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> that cometh forth מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> from the LORD

וְיָב֣וֹאוּ <WH935> And they come אֵ֠לֶיךָ <WH413> about כִּמְבוֹא־ <WH3996> cometh עָ֞ם <WH5971> unto thee as the people וְיֵשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> and they sit לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> thee [as] my people וְשָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> and they hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <WH1697> thy words וְאוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַֽעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> but they will not do כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עֲגָבִ֤ים <WH5690> much love בְּפִיהֶם֙ <WH6310> them for with their mouth הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they עֹשִׂ֔ים <WH6213> they shew אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after בִצְעָ֖ם <WH1215> their covetousness לִבָּ֥ם <WH3820> [but] their heart הֹלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> goeth

וְהִנְּךָ֤ <WH2005> behold לָהֶם֙ כְּשִׁ֣יר <WH7892> song עֲגָבִ֔ים <WH5690> And lo thou [art] unto them as a very lovely יְפֵ֥ה <WH3303> of one that hath a pleasant ק֖וֹל <WH6963> voice וּמֵטִ֣ב <WH2895> and can play well נַגֵּ֑ן <WH5059> on an instrument וְשָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> for they hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <WH1697> thy words וְעֹשִׂ֥ים <WH6213> but they do אֵינָ֖ם <WH369> else אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וּבְבֹאָ֑הּ <WH935> And when this cometh to pass הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold בָאָ֔ה <WH935> (lo it will come וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> ) then shall they know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that נָבִ֖יא <WH5030> that a prophet הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has been בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> hath been among ס
